Client.Name: Onnuri Church
Client.Role: Data onramp entity that provides data onboarding services to multiple clients

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Lstonz has been established to provide a data onboarding service for churches aiming to store their data on the Filecoin network. Church data refers to videos related to pastors' sermons, choir performances, and other activities within the church. Most churches currently store recent data on their church website servers, while past data is often stored on hard drives and kept in storage warehouses. Furthermore, the lack of proper categorization for the data on these hard drives makes it extremely difficult to locate the storage locations when the church needs to find the data to restore. To address these issues, Lstonz not only conducts indexing tasks for church data but also monitors data preparation processes for storage on the Filecoin network. As the first client, Onnuri Church, which is one of top 10 large churches in Korea, agreed to store all pastors' video data into filecoin network. And Lstonz is planning to expand its services to other small and large churches.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Once the datacap is approved, initially the famous pastor Ha's sermon videos will be stored onto filecoin network, which covers most chapters of the Bible. Once this initiative is completed, video data of Onnuri Church's other activities as well as similar video data of many other churches will be stored in the near future.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America, Australia (continent)
